featured.title: Chrome Dino AI
featured.description: Genetic algorithm that learns to play the Chrome dinosaur game. Built from scratch in C++ for CS126 Software Design Studio.

featured.title: IoT Anomaly Detection
featured.description: First place at HackIllinois 2020. Isolation forest + DeepAnT for detecting sensor anomalies in Caterpillar's IoT data.

featured.title: CV Rock Paper Scissors
featured.description: Play rock paper scissors with your computer using just hand gestures. Computer vision detects your move automatically.

other.title: Schedule Generator
other.description: Full-stack schedule optimization tool built for CS 411. Uses MySQL, AWS, Neo4J, and React.

other.title: LA Crime Analysis
other.description: Data visualization project exploring trends in Los Angeles crime data.
